name: ArchitectTable
short_description:
The Project Table is one of the most useful blocks added in RedPower2.  This is a similar tool -- it should do all the same stuff and then some but the coding is all my own -- for those who don't wish to install the entirety of RP2, be it because it's not updated or because it's large.

Art by the esteemable rexsmart!  My texture was the most ugly thing I have ever created.

*ALL* credit for the original idea goes to Eloraam.  RP2 is amazing.  I came up with hopper compatibility and multi-layer blueprints all on my lonesome.  And they're awesome. Just sayin'
summary: Similar to and inspired by Eloraam's Project Table from RedPower2
